Pre-Game Insights: Oklahoma City Thunder (7-0, first in the Western Conference) vs. Denver Nuggets (3-3, eighth in the Western Conference).
BETMGM SPORTSBOOK LINE: Thunder -3.5; over/under is 222.
Denver went 57-25 overall, 10-6 in Northwest Division action and 33-8 at home a season ago. The Nuggets gave up 109.6 points per game while committing 18.2 fouls last season.
Oklahoma City went 57-25 overall, 12-4 in Northwest Division play and 24-17 on the road last season. The Thunder averaged 8.5 steals, 6.6 blocks and 11.8 turnovers per game last season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nuggets injuries: Vlatko Cancar: day to day (ankle), Jamal Murray: day to day (concussion), DaRon Holmes II: out for season (achilles).
Thunder injuries: Kenrich Williams: day to day (knee), Isaiah Hartenstein: out (hand), Jaylin Williams: out (hamstring), Nikola Topic: out for season (acl).
